title: Very tighten the waist
comment: Need to return my original size of 28 tall. I forgot the high-rise in Gap runs  very tight in the waist. I'm going totry to order up two sizes to see if those work I know with white jeans, you normally go up a size but the review said it was true to size. It's not. Gap!  Please make a rise Bermuda short for we tall girls.

title: True to Size, nice length
comment:
I would normally never buy a "bermuda" length bc i feel like it doesnt look flattering on my more pear-shaped build but these fit great and true to size. A great alternative to shorter denim shorts and length prevents chafing thighs and the lengths bunching up at the crotch when walking. 

The waistband is fairly comfortable but if u sit for long periods of time u might find the waistband starting to dig in since it doesnt have much stretch in the waist. 

I actually prefer the look of a raw hem but i wish GAP would put a stay stitch so it wont start unraveling once u throw it in the wash. Overall i recommend this short!

title: Not a good fit
comment: Wide legs and sheer white fabric lousy shorts

title: Not a good fit
comment: Wide legs the fabric was cheap

title: Love them.
comment: Really like these shorts. Thick fabric, legs can be rolled up if you want them a little shorter or leave them longer to wear with a jacket or over shirt.

title: Perfect Jean shorts for summer travel
comment: I found the sizing accurate, the fit flattering  and the length perfect. I had to return the 26 because it was tight at the waist. The 27 is a little loose but I can tuck a shirt inside. I'm 5' 5" and 115 lbs. It's not a baggy fit but also not a skinny Jean fit. Perfect!

title: Great fit for long shorts
comment: My usual size is a 27 so that's what I bought. (Reference: 5'4" 125lbs) They fit perfectly around my thighs, as in there's no extra room. Not tight, but not loose either, so I would say these are true to size. I saw another review stating they were way too loose in the legs for her but not for me! Obviously it depends on how thick your thighs are. I'm going to try the 28 for a looser/slouchier fit. I'll see if that works to get the fit I want.

title: Comfortable and flattering
comment: These fit beautifully- just enough give without "bagging out"- colt is great as well as length

title: Denim Bermuda Shorts
comment: Great fit, comfortable.

title: Good Fit, Style, & Quality
comment: I wear a Gap size 6 and ordered a size 6- tall.  The high waist means it runs slightly smaller for me than the normal sizing, so the waist is a little tight, and I ordered the tall to get a slightly longer length, but I love the way they fit and think the higher waist is flattering.  The denim fabric feels high-quality.  These feel like they will be a classic staple in my closet for years.

title: Old Lady Shorts
comment: I have the jeans and love the way they feel & look on me. I expected these to fit the same. Size is off, I wear a 26 petite and maybe that is the issue; I didn't buy the petite sizing, I bought 26 regular. I wasn't expecting the ragged unsewn hem, I didn't notice in pictures. I fold it up and maybe will sew it. The shorts are a good length now though. Bottomline- these are high rise so look like old lady shorts, not what I wanted.

title: Very comfortable
comment: I normally wear size 31 jeans from the Gap, but accidentally ordered a 32 in these (not thinking). I figured they would be too big and have to be returned, but they actually fit very well (slightly roomy in the waist, bit fitted in the rear). So I'd say these run a bit small. They are comfortable, the high waist is great and the length is spot on for me. I am 5"6, size 12.
